tenant_ids.title: Tenant IDs
tenant_ids.description: Comma separated list of Tenant IDs of tenants to download the data from. Leave empty to download all available. Data will be merged from all provided tenants.

date.title: Date
date.description: Date must be set in YYYY-MM-DD format or to "last_month/last_year" which will use the last day of previous month/year.

periods.title: Periods (Optional)
periods.description: The number of periods to compare

timeframe.title: Timeframe
timeframe.description: The period size to compare to (MONTH, QUARTER, YEAR)

tracking_option_id1.title: Tracking Option ID1 (Optional)
tracking_option_id1.description: The balance sheet will be filtered by this option if supplied. Note you cannot filter just by the TrackingCategory.

tracking_option_id2.title: Tracking Option ID2 (Optional)
tracking_option_id2.description: If you want to filter by more than one tracking category option then you can specify a second option too. See the Balance Sheet report in Xero learn more about this behavior when filtering by tracking category options.

standard_layout.title: Standard Layout
standard_layout.description: If you set this parameter to "true" then no custom report layouts will be applied to response.

payments_only.title: Payments Only
payments_only.description: Set this to true to get cash transactions only.

previous_periods.title: Previous periods
previous_periods.description: The number of previous periods to fetch data for. For example, if set to 3, the data for the current period and the previous 3 periods will be fetched. If set to 0, only the current period will be fetched.

load_type.title: Load Type
load_type.description: If Full load is used, the destination table will be overwritten every run. If incremental load is used, data will be upserted into the destination table. Tables with a primary key will have rows updated, tables without a primary key will have rows appended.
